      • nextValidConnection

        @Deprecated
public ClientConnection nextValidConnection()
        Deprecated. 
        loops over all valid connections and only returns null of there are no valid connections import for shutdown which invalidates connections.
        Returns:
        next valid open connection, or null of there are none.
